title: Don't understand why I'M the one getting chat restricted.
body:
RIOT clearly doesn't understand negative or demotivating attitude which leads to saltiness/tiltness. When a person starts talking shit or types a comment that aggravates the person not playing as well instead of giving constructive criticism or simply being NICE, IT'S GOING TO GIVE OFF A DIFFERENT REACTION. I reciprocate attitude and emotion so if someone tells me: "Oh it's ok dude! Next time, learn to just ward or not face check the bush.." then I would feel way more comfortable than instead of saying "Yeah, this is why your bronze" Like really Riot? You can't tell who started it yet you can easily identify who the mad person is. THE ONLY REASON WHY SOMEONE IS MAD IS BECAUSE SOMETHING IS WRONG

THERE ARE TWO PEOPLE MAD
ONE OF WHICH IS MAD BECAUSE A PLAYER ISN'T DEEMED WELL ENOUGH
ONE OF WHICH IS MAD BECAUSE A PLAYER IS TRYING BUT IS UNDERMINED. Not even given advice. Just trash talked.

All this and I get my honor, chat restriction, and free loot revoked. Yeah whatever riot. Some league community. Maybe hire some people who can assess and read a little more thoroughly before making such a rash decision caused by the ORIGNATOR NOT THE PERSON MIMICKING THEIR ACTIONS. Lol.

Edit: Answers from the community so far:
a) Each person is responsible for their own behavior.
b) Don't cry when you get punished.
c) Control emotions
d) Don't respond and mute

RIOT understands what they're doing. Keeping what I said above and I apologize. My actions, my responsibility

replies.body:
You're the one that doesn't understand.  It doesn't matter what your excuse is. 

They tell you the rules, they tell you the punishments, and still you do it.  For whatever reason. Don't cry when you get punished.

Finding out if they got punished too is not your business.

I'm just telling you what happened lol what's with the I don't understand? 
I hope you realize I was just playing my lane and if I don't call mia or die twice, I get called out for being a shit player or this is why you're bronze. 
Isn't that the first comment that produces a desired result of what you call "bad behavior"

And it kind of is my business. League is still a corporation in the end and if there's a system going on that's unjust, I want to know. But i mean, your word against mine.

Don't cry when you get punished. thanks for the lol

Each person is responsible for their own behavior.

Poor behavior in retaliation doesn't make it any more acceptable.

So you're saying because I responded in a poor behavior caused by the FIRST persons bad comment, it's soley my fault? There should be a feature that shows if both parties were convicted or not. Feels as though this is unfair and yes I understand poor behavior in defense does not make it any more acceptable.

Yes. Your response, your fault.

That’s like saying “someone yelled at me on the street so I set their house on fire - you can’t hold me accountable for that!!!!!”

If you behave poorly, you are responsible. Riot expects you to control your emotions and be a decent fellow teammate and opponent at all times.
Thanks for the analogy. Makes more sense. (Just don't be the guy yelling) Kappa

You fed the trolls. Dont do that.
Yeah, next time, mute right away and just play. FIrst time getting chat restricted so it's kinda irking me

After the second or third comment, whether it's demotivating, verbal abuse, or harassment, I will always and most likely mute them. Only after I "copy" their tone and attitude and respond in a similar fashion to give off the same hostility I felt. And of course, they get tilted to the point where they report me cause they can't say anthing to me and I won't be able to see or respond afterward.
